name: Font BLOKK Integration
author: Manuel Costales

sections.description: This plugin add the font BLOKK (http://blokkfont.com) to your wordpress site, and add the feature to create a mockup to show to your clients without to worry about the dummy text you enter. This plugin integrate two fonts: BLOKK Regular and BLOKK Neue-Regular, to use them you only have to add the class blokk-regular and blokk-neue respectively.
sections.installation:
To install this plugin just follow the standard procedure.

or

  1. Upload font-blokk-integration.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Any question?

Send me an email at mcostales@jumptoweb.com and I will answer you as soon as I can.

short_description: This plugin integrate the font BLOKK with your wordpress installation.
